summary: Example suite demonstrating how to use DGL's Gated Graph Neural Network (GGNN) and Gated Graph Sequence Neural Network (GGSNN) models with PyTorch to solve various bAbI reasoning tasks, including node selection, graph classification, and path‑finding, by providing data preprocessing utilities, model definitions, and end‑to‑end training/evaluation scripts.
business_intent: Offer a ready‑to‑run reference implementation for researchers and developers to experiment with graph neural networks on symbolic reasoning benchmarks, reproduce the results of the original GGNN paper, and serve as a learning resource for building and training GNN models on custom graph‑structured data.
